attributes.action: retrofit wind, solar pv and hot water systems to all buildings on UK MoD sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please retrofit renewable energy systems to all buildings on permenant UK MoD (Army/Navy/Airforce) sites.  Link systems together to form internal electrical grid, using power from disused buildings to occupied ones.  Unused power can be exported to make money.  Spend to save scheme.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
